title: Polymer Physics
description: Physical chemistry of polymer solutions, polymer miscibility, adsorptions, sorptions, plasticization, molecular weights, molecular weight distributions. Study of polymer surfaces.  Credit not allowed for MSE 4140.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: MSE 3001 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and MSE 4775 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
